document_data.name: ''Queen of Kingpins''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Queen of Kingpins''''' was a record book compiled by the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenaries of [[Baldur's Gate]] on [[The Guild]] and [[Nine-Fingers Keene]] sometime in or before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Contents: The book held information on the Guild, including the name and description of one of its thugs, [[Tusgront]], who guarded the entrance to Nine-Fingers' base or at least one of the Guild's hideouts in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of Baldur's Gate. The book also had detailed information on the Guild's individual thugs, whom the Flaming Fist considered to be quite dim-witted. The book's tone changed when it talked about [[Astele Keene]] herself. It noted her sharp intelligence and used sullen, fearful tones.
document_data.History: A copy of ''Queen of Kingpins'' was stored in the basement and the printing room of the [[Baldur's Mouth]] offices in the Lower City in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
